parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description:
The end time of the validity period for the policy.

This value is a UNIX timestamp representing the number of milliseconds that have elapsed since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC.

parameters.name: GroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the application group.

parameters.name: PolicyType
parameters.description: The policy type. Valid value: PauseNotify.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description:
The start time of the validity period for the policy.

This value is a UNIX timestamp representing the number of milliseconds that have elapsed since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC.
